recipeInstructions.text: Place margarine and onions in a 6 cup mixing bowl. Microwave on high until crisp-tender (3-4 min). Mix in cornstarch. Stir in half and half, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Microwave uncovered 1 min. Stir. microwave uncovered until thickened about 2 minutes longer. Stir in crabmeat and mushrooms. Spoon into baking dish or two shallow casseroles. Mix breadcrumbs, cheese and margarine. Sprinkle over top(s). Cover loosely and microwave until hot. (3-4 minutes)
